Package com.example.ex4.controller

Class ApiController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ex4.controller.ApiController
@Controller
public class ApiController
extends java.lang.Object
The type Api controller. this controller responsible of to update the DB, and send update to the users of who still online and the last messages.

  • Method Details

    • getDB

      private ChatInter getDB()
      get function for the database.
      Returns:
      access to database

    • insert

      @PostMapping("/addMessage") @ResponseBody public ResMes insert​(@RequestParam java.lang.String mess)
      This function get the message, validate the message and check if the user still online, and if everything is good - save the message in DB. finally, the function return ReqMes object answer (message inside)
      Parameters:
      mess - the message from the user that he wants to send
      Returns:
      the answer

    • retToSearch

      @GetMapping("/searchText") public java.lang.String retToSearch​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Ret to search string. this is a get request - and this function determines destination for this url. the function disallowing to search via get request.
      Parameters:
      model - the model
      Returns:
      the url for the next page

    • getAll

      @PostMapping("/searchText") @ResponseBody public java.util.List<ChatMessage> getAll​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ReqMes reqMessage, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Get all list. this function get the user request to search with type of search and the text itself. the function get the data from the DB and send back answer.
      Parameters:
      reqMessage - the req message
      result - the result
      Returns:
      the list with the results.

    • moveTo

      @GetMapping("/checkUpdate") public java.lang.String moveTo​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Move to string. this is a get request - and this function determines destination for this url. the function disallowing check for update via get request.
      Parameters:
      model - the model with the message to the next page (if necessary)
      Returns:
      the string

    • checkUpdate

      @PostMapping("/checkUpdate") @ResponseBody public java.util.List<ChatMessage> checkUpdate()
      Check update list. This function returns the last five messages after verifying the user is still online.
      Returns:
      the list

    • getOnlineUsers

      @PostMapping("/userUpdate") @ResponseBody public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOnlineUsers()
      Gets online users. Returns a list with all connected users after verifying the user is still online.
      Returns:
      the online users

    • searchText

      private java.util.List<ChatMessage> searchText​(java.lang.String text)
      This function checks if the wanted text find contained in the database If so- the function will add the text to the returned list
      Parameters:
      text - - The wanted text to find.
      Returns:
      list with the search results.

    • updateUserTime

      private void updateUserTime()
      This function will update the last relevant time for the user.
